predicate.note: Frames file for 'beget' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 27.

roleset.name: bring into existence

example.name: I love strong verbs
example.text: The concept begot a slew of copycats, but the banks stopped promoting the packages.

roleset.note: Actually, I believe the past tense of 'beget' is 'begat.' OED doesn't agree with me, though, calling 'begat' archaic. Pfah, what do they know?
